name: Resources & Case Management
description: Homeless Children's Network Case Management staff provides resources and referrals, which are designed to enhance families’ sense of connection to the communities in which they live and ensure that the changing needs of the child and family are met. Case Managers provide: - Basic needs services - Holiday support - Diaper bank -housing support -school supplies

howToGetIt: For more information on any of these services visit: https://www.hcnkids.org/resources-case-management or email cm@hcnkids.org or call (415) 437-3990 for intake. https://4bc0ca53-b0bb-4d9a-9978-199d47b45b5b.filesusr.com/ugd/fc0618_f4aff2fcc0a84950b1585efa06b13450.pdf
